Posts.Content: I have now been told I may have to have a mastectomy as opposed to a lumpectomy. How much help will I need in the week following the operation?
Posts.Title: Mastectomy after care

Posts.Content: Hi Ladies. I have just taken my very first Letrozole, after looking at the packet for most of the evening. Have seen the discussions about joint pain and hot flushes and the measures you take to alleviate them (calcium, vit D, magnesium). It gas been an education for me, especially now that I am on the recieving end of treatment (I am an  Oncology nurse). I look forward to all your common sense advice. Take care of your selves.  Gina xx
Posts.Title: Aching bones with Letrozol

Posts.Content: I have just been diagnosed with breast cancer. I am having a lumpectomy and two lymph nodes removed from under my arm. It has just occured to me that I have no idea what clothes to wear after the surgery as I have been told I wont be able to lift my right arm up so (typical its my right arm and I am right handed!
Posts.Title: Hello
